scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=devlopment  nodemon ./app.js  && echo "nodemon app.js --dev-- successfully started"
scripts.preview: cross-env NODE_ENV=preview nodemon start ./app.js && echo "nodemon app.js--preview-- successfully started"
scripts.start:pm2: cross-env NODE_ENV=production pm2 start ./app.js && echo "pm2 app.js--production-- successfully started"
